name: meepo_spawn_04
text: Name's Meepo. Geomancer. Pleased to meet ya.
text_simple: names meepo geomancer pleased to meet ya

name: meepo_begin_01
text: Let's get this over with. I ain't leaving empty handed!
text_simple: lets get this over with i aint leaving empty handed

text: Probably gonna dig a grave or two before this is done.

name: meepo_kill_08
text: I guess size ain't everything, eh? Eh!? Ha ha ha aww it is.
text_simple: i guess size aint everything eh eh ha ha ha aww it is

name: meepo_kill_09
text: I guess size ain't everything, eh?
text_simple: i guess size aint everything eh

text: You ain't the boss of me!
text_simple: you aint the boss of me

name: meepo_rival_11
text: You're the king of sand? Well I'm the king of dirt!

text: You and what army, Phantom Lancer?

text: I feel fine. Don't know what everyone's worried about.
